data.title: New London, CT
data.meta_description: July weather for New London, Connecticut: In New London, July is identified by the average highest temperatures, reaching a peak of 78.6°F (25.9°C) and a low of 66.7°F (19.3°C). In New London, during July, the rain falls for 15.8 days and regularly aggregates up to 2.44" (62mm) of precipitation.
data.text:
Average high temperature in July: 78.6°F

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (78.6°F).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (36.1°F).

Average low temperature in July: 66.7°F

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (66.7°F).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (26.2°F).

New London, CT

Average snowfall in July: 0"

The month with the highest snowfall is March (2.56").

The months with the least snowfall are May, June, July, August, September and October (0").

Average snowfall days in July

New London, CT

Average snowfall days in July: 0 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is February (6.8 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July, August, September and October (0 days).

New London, CT

Average daylight in July: 14h and 5min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 15h and 6min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 9h and 12min).

Average sunshine in July: 10h and 3min

The month with the most sunshine is August (Average sunshine: 10h and 36min).

The months with the least sunshine are February and December (Average sunshine: 4h and 54min).

Average UV index in July: 6

The months with the highest UV index are June, July and August (UV index 6).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, February, March, November and December (UV index 2).

Average visibility in July: 6mi

The months with the highest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (6mi).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (6mi).
